{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3624079,"name":"Darren Cronstrom ","username":"_Valerie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/_/6de8d8/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-14T13:58:18.284Z","cooked":"

There were a few parts that I needed for a design (Rev-21-1000 T-Slot Extrusion, the Vex VersaPlanetary Gearbox system, and a 4" OD Vex Omni Wheel), but I didn’t see them in the MKCad library, so I took the time to create the models for them myself. Is there anywhere that I can upload the files to add them to the library so they are easier to access for other people in the future?

MKCAD is being replaced by FRCDesignLib

FRCDesignLib - Feedback Needed CAD
Hello FRC Teams, The FRCDesign.org team has been working hard over these past few weeks on something new and exciting. As part of our ongoing efforts to improve FRC CAD resources, we are tackling the monumental task of refreshing the MKCad Library. We’ve identified a few key areas of improvement we hope to address with the new library: Key Areas for Improvement: Organization of documents (decluttering, easier to search) BOM, material, and appearance accuracy and consistency Configurability o…

As Allen said, MKCAD is being replaced with FRCDesignLib. See the link above to join the closed beta, but we are going to be adding all products at some point, just unsure as to an exact timeline at the moment. For now, I would say if you or anyone needs an exact product not in either library, just download the file directly from the vendor for now.

However, I notice that both the 4" Omni and a configurable versaplanetary gearbox are in MKCAD. Are you sure you were in an assembly when you tried to insert them?

I didn’t see either of them while I was looking, maybe I just missed it, or put the wrong keywords into the search bar
